Device

Formal description of a device, general subclasses, related classes and properties.

http://e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ device
a
owl:Ontology
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of a device, general subclasses, related classes and properties.

Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about device
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11
computer
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Machine using programmed instructions to perform arithmetic and logic operations automatically, to perform a task.

and

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

electronic machine
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Electric machine manipulating the motion of electrons in an electrical current in ways that add meaningful information to the current, to perform a task.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ device#
rdfs:subClassOf
electric machine
machine
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Device having more than one part, each with a function, and transmitting a force or directing its application to perform a task.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ device#

and
